Multi purpose, for baby care, your own skin care, screen wiping ,household cleaning......Great for camping and the playa, perfect for the RV.Great for Beauty salon. baby care makeup removing homemade wet wipes multipurpose towel
Also don't forget to prepare these clean wipes for your pets, to clean their eyes, nose , mouth and teeth. They are happy, you are happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toilet wipe alternative
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as an alternative to the toilet wipes. I developed an allergic reaction to all brands of toilet wipes due to the preservatives they use. These bamboo based wipes are soft and durable. They work just as good as the toilet wipes with just a spray of distilled water.Only draw back is you cannot flush them, but I bought a sealed trash can and I dispose of them that way. No smell and very environmental. Not to mention safer for your home plumbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like this idea of dry wipe, to just add water so I don't have to worry about ingredients in wipes. I am adult and use them after #2 and during menstruation. They also are good to have on hand in the purse during travel, work as a tissue/napkin as well. Good material. Only down side is they are a bit small, maybe that is good bc creates less waste, it is sufficient size just much smaller than your typical wipe. I will probably buy again. Does the job, I am happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Blends in with the color of baby poop but otherwise good
reviews.reviewText: I used these as an alternative to wet wipes on my baby. They are pretty good, soft and durable. The drawbacks is that the yellowish color blended in with my breastfed baby’s yellow poop. So it was a bit hard to tell when there was no more poop to wipe. So i still ended up using white wet wipes. The material is so soft though. And pretty durable/thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love these for my baby !
reviews.reviewText: i usually never leave reviews but this one is for the parents looking for dry wipes for their babies whom are sensitive when i say i have bought every wipe brand im not lying my baby would get bad rashes so i would constantly switch diapers and nothing worked i switch wipes from the best brands to brands like costco wipes etc most were too dry, too soapy, too wet, or just too ruff & when i finally found these i was so happy with the outcome i just add a lil bit of water to every wipe and end the diaper change with a dry one they are so soft & all natural my baby hasn’t gotten a rash since i’ve switched so i’ll definitely be sticking to these ones 🙏🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Backpacking
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for backpacking. Small and lightweight, but also durable. I mix a few drops of antibacterial essential oils to a little water in a 1oz craft bottle with a twist nozzle, shake, and squirt onto one of these dry wipes wadded up (they are very absorbent). Then I un-wad them and wash my face and then pits, private bits, and finally feet. Perfect lightweight way to clean and sanitize your face and body while on the trail to prevent skin infections and body odor. Since the wipes are bamboo and naturally antimicrobial, the used ones don't stink when you store the trash in your pack until you can dispose of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbleached biodegradable bamboo
reviews.reviewText: A little pricy but worth it. Bamboo material free of pesticides, unbleached free of chemicals 100% satisfied customer will be ordering again before i run out. I make wipes out of these and use as kleenex. They are soft and strong and the size is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worthwhile to get
reviews.reviewText: Versatile & sturdy. Loved the product packaging. I didn't have to worry about another customer blowing their nose and sending the item back. Loved that they were lent free!!..And cute to carry around. I would buy again and have already recommended to a Biochemist professor to help with her allergies.

Using these for nappy changes. Little one loves the texture on these wipes. It's so soft and smooth, and doesn't leave the skin red unlike the usual wet wipes which have rough texture from the nonwoven fabric as well as chemicals. I use these with the California Baby diaper spray and it works magic everytime.
